name: guatemala patzun - finca santa anita
description: Caramel flavor, walnut, milk chocolate, apricot and nectarine acidity with honey and bittering cocoa notes.

name: colombia huila pitalito - guttierrez-calderon
description: Apple sweetness, chocolate, citrus oil, black tea, crisp and clean cup, chocolate mousse finish.

name: ethiopia kaffa - mitchiti coop
description: Dried peach, creamy body, pineapple, fresh ginger, balanced brightness, citrus acidity, earl grey tea. Great for iced coffee.

name: el salvador - finca matalapa bourbon
description: Fresh caramel, almond, complex notes of pear and apple with a mild citrusy sweetness. Great as single-origin espresso.

name: espresso roast
description: Varies by current blend, please contact us for our present selections
